projects.name: claude-howto
projects.description: Visual, example-driven guide to Claude Code — from basic concepts to advanced agents, with 50+ copy-paste templates

projects.name: cc-context-stats
projects.description: Real-time Claude Code context usage monitoring — track session tokens across three operational zones to prevent performance degradation

projects.name: voice-cast
projects.description: Voice cloning and text-to-speech with multiple engines — clone any voice from a short audio sample and generate speech in that voice

projects.name: llm-cli
projects.description: Modular CLI for managing and running local LLMs with llama.cpp — search, download, chat, benchmark, and serve models

projects.name: vscode-markdown-preview
projects.description: Clean, minimal markdown preview for VS Code inspired by Zed — syntax highlighting, Mermaid diagrams, KaTeX math, and export to HTML/PDF

projects.name: mdoctor
projects.description: Keep your Mac healthy — comprehensive CLI to diagnose, clean, fix, and benchmark your macOS system. Pure Bash, zero dependencies

projects.name: git-auto-switch
projects.description: Manage multiple GitHub accounts with automatic identity switching based on workspace folders

projects.name: yt-search-lib
projects.description: Powerful, purely client-side JavaScript library for searching YouTube videos without an API key — zero dependencies, smart caching
